data.eml:eml: In the shadow of a megalopolis, a new Flexamia from a threatened grass species in the New Jersey Pine Barrens (Hemiptera, Cicadellidae, Deltocephalinae, Paralimnini)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Hicks, Andrew (2015): In the shadow of a megalopolis, a new Flexamia from a threatened grass species in the New Jersey Pine Barrens (Hemiptera, Cicadellidae, Deltocephalinae, Paralimnini). ZooKeys 511: 69-79, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.511.9572, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.511.9572
